SEARCH
Package plugin

Class AnalyzerGeneXpert

java.lang.Object
plugin.AnalyzerGeneXpert
All Implemented Interfaces:
plugin.Analyzer
public class AnalyzerGeneXpert extends Object implements plugin.Analyzer
Implementation of the Analyzer interface specific for GeneXpert analyzers.

This class provides the functionalities needed to communicate with GeneXpert analyzers using ASTM protocol, handling LAB-27, LAB-28, and LAB-29 transactions.

    • lab27

      public String lab27(String msg)
      Handles a LAB-27 transaction (ASTM query from analyzer). Converts ASTM Q| message into HL7 QBP^Q11, sends to LabBook, receives RSP^K11, and converts the response back into ASTM format.
      Specified by:
      lab27 in interface plugin.Analyzer
      Parameters:
      msg - The raw ASTM message received from GeneXpert
      Returns:
      ASTM response to send back to analyzer, or null if error

    • lab28

      public String lab28(String str_OML_O33)
      Handles a LAB-28 transaction (order message from LIS to analyzer). Parses the incoming HL7 OML^O33 message, extracts patient/specimen/order info, converts the message into ASTM format, and sends it to the analyzer over socket. Returns an HL7 ACK^R22 to confirm whether the analyzer accepted the message (ACK) or not (NAK).
      Specified by:
      lab28 in interface plugin.Analyzer
      Parameters:
      str_OML_O33 - HL7 message string in ER7 format (OML^O33)
      Returns:
      HL7 ACK^R22 message to be returned to LabBook

    • lab29

      public String lab29(String msg)
      Handles a LAB-29 transaction (ASTM results from analyzer). Parses ASTM result lines into HL7 OUL^R22, forwards to LabBook, receives HL7 ACK, and returns an ASTM L|1|Y or L|1|N acknowledgement.
      Specified by:
      lab29 in interface plugin.Analyzer
      Parameters:
      msg - ASTM message sent by GeneXpert (results)
      Returns:
      Minimal ASTM ACK segment or fallback error response

    • convertOML_O33ToASTM

      public String[] convertOML_O33ToASTM(String oml)
      Converts an HL7 OML^O33 order message into a set of ASTM lines compatible with GeneXpert. Extracts patient identifiers, demographic info, specimen ID/type, and order details (OBR). If the message lacks necessary segments (e.g., SPM or OBR), returns an error message.
      Parameters:
      oml - HL7 OML^O33 message string (pipe-delimited format)
      Returns:
      Array of ASTM-formatted lines to be sent to the analyzer

    • generateAckR22

      public String generateAckR22(String originalOML, String ackCode)
      Generates an HL7 ACK^R22 message in response to a received OML^O33 order. The ACK reuses key fields (e.g., message control ID, sender/receiver IDs) from the original message.
      Parameters:
      originalOML - The original HL7 OML^O33 message string
      ackCode - The acknowledgment code to return: "AA" (Accept) or "AE" (Error)
      Returns:
      The generated HL7 ACK^R22 message in ER7 format, or null if generation failed

    • convertASTMtoOUL_R22

      public String convertASTMtoOUL_R22(String[] lines)
      Converts ASTM-formatted GeneXpert result lines into an HL7 OUL^R22 message.
      Parameters:
      lines - An array of ASTM lines (e.g., H|..., P|..., O|..., R|..., etc.)
      Returns:
      The HL7 OUL^R22 message in ER7 format or null if conversion fails.

    • convertACKtoASTM

      public String convertACKtoASTM(String hl7Ack)
      Converts an HL7 ACK message (typically from LabBook) into a minimal ASTM acknowledgment. If the ACK contains MSA-1 = "AA" (Application Accept), returns "L|1|Y" (success). For any other acknowledgment code, returns "L|1|N" (failure).
      Parameters:
      hl7Ack - HL7 ACK message as an ER7-formatted string
      Returns:
      ASTM acknowledgment line (e.g., "L|1|Y" or "L|1|N")

    • convertASTMQueryToQBP_Q11

      public String convertASTMQueryToQBP_Q11(String[] lines)
      Converts ASTM-formatted GeneXpert query (e.g., Q line) into an HL7 QBP^Q11 message.
      Parameters:
      lines - An array of ASTM lines (e.g., starting with Q|...)
      Returns:
      HL7 QBP^Q11 message in ER7 format or null if conversion fails.

    • convertRSP_K11toASTM

      public String[] convertRSP_K11toASTM(String hl7Message)
      Converts an HL7 RSP^K11 response into an ASTM reply for GeneXpert. Rule: - Return L|1|Y when the RSP^K11 was processed successfully (even if no orders are present). - Return L|1|N only on technical/parsing errors.
      Parameters:
      hl7Message - HL7 RSP^K11 message in ER7 format
      Returns:
      Array of ASTM-formatted lines to return to the analyzer

    • sendASTMMessage

      public String sendASTMMessage(String[] lines)
      Sends an ASTM message (line by line) to the analyzer over the active socket. Each line is framed using ASTM E1381 protocol (STX, frame number, payload, ETX, checksum, CR, LF). The sender waits for ACK or NAK after ENQ and after each frame. This implementation does not retry frame transmission after a NAK. On NAK or timeout, the transmission is aborted and an error status is returned.
      Parameters:
      lines - ASTM message split into lines (H|..., P|..., O|..., L|...)
      Returns:
      "ACK" if all frames were accepted, otherwise "NAK", "UNKNOWN", or "ERROR"

    • getMappingPath

      public String getMappingPath()
      Gets the mapping configuration path.
      Specified by:
      getMappingPath in interface plugin.Analyzer
      Returns:
      The mapping configuration path.

    • setMappingPath

      Parameters:

    • listenDevice

      public void listenDevice()
      Starts the analyzer communication thread. SERVER mode is the validated deployment mode (socket accept loop + ASTM E1381 FSM per connection). CLIENT mode exists for compatibility tests and is considered experimental.
      Specified by:
      listenDevice in interface plugin.Analyzer

    • connectAsClient

      public void connectAsClient() throws IOException
      Establishes a connection to the analyzer in CLIENT mode.

      This method initializes the socket connection using the configured IP address and port of the analyzer. It sets up input and output streams for subsequent message exchanges (e.g., ASTM transactions).

      If a connection already exists and is open, no action is performed.

      Throws:
      IOException - if the connection attempt fails due to network errors or invalid connection parameters.

    • readASTMMessage

      public static String readASTMMessage(InputStream inputStream) throws IOException
      Reads an ASTM message from the input stream using ASTM E1381 framing. Waits for STX...ETX frames, extracts the message body, and strips framing bytes. Note: This method does not validate checksums.
      Parameters:
      inputStream - Input stream from the socket (e.g., analyzer connection)
      Returns:
      Full ASTM message as a string (CR-delimited segments), or empty string if none
      Throws:
      IOException - If socket read fails or stream is closed

    • stopListening

      public void stopListening()
      Specified by:
      stopListening in interface plugin.Analyzer
